member.name: M:C1.Win.Layout.Design.DashboardParentControlDesigner._enableDesignMode(System.ComponentModel.IComponent,System.String)
member.summary: This method does exactly what ParentControlDesigner.EnableDesignMode does, but because we also need _disableDesignMode, this method is used for clarity.
member.param: The nested component to enable design mode for.

member.name: M:C1.Win.Layout.Design.DashboardParentControlDesigner._disableDesignMode(System.ComponentModel.IComponent)
member.param: The nested component to disable design mode for.
